body: Sometimes I learn more things in nhentai comments than anywhere else.

@WhiteHorse69 nothing, it is no direct download but a torrent, for which you will need a torrent client. torrents work by sharing of data among the users, a central tracker holds information about who can give which part and who still needs which part, thus an efficient delivery of data is realized without having one very expensive central giver
when i download this ( or other doujinshi ) say "torrent", what i do wrong?
